show_name: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King (movie)
other_title: Berserk L'âge d'Or Arc I : L'oeuf du Roi Conquérant (French)
Berserk Ōgon Jidai-Hen I: Haō no Tamago (Japanese)
Berserk – L’Epoca D’Oro I: L'uovo del Re conquistatore (Italian)
Berserk: La edad de oro I - El huevo del rey conquistador (Spanish)
The Golden Age Arc I: The High King's Egg. (Japanese)
Берсерк: Золотой век. Фильм I: бехерит Властителя (Russian)
ベルセルク 黄金時代篇Ⅰ 覇王の卵 (Japanese)
plot: Guts is a young and highly skilled mercenary living in a medieval era of the Midland monarchy. During the siege of a castle, he catches the attention of Griffith, leader of a mercenary army called Band of the Hawk. As the two meet again, Guts ends up joining the notorious group.
ending_theme: "Utsukushikimono" (ウツクシキモノ; "Something Beautiful") by Ai
